Reviews.Title: “Best Bed Ever!!”
Reviews.Author: candysomthin
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with my Mother In Law and 2 daughters. The beds are THE BEST EVER! They are so comfy, I didn't want to get up! They have wonderful pillow tops and even have REAL quilts on them. The owners are so nice, will do anything they can to make your stay better. I would stay here again for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Very good value in Branson”
Reviews.Author: monk36
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had a very peasant stay at the Seven Gables Inn while visiting Branson. The room was very clean and large. Parking was conveniently close to the room, and the hotel is right in the middle of town. Breakfast was good with hot dishes served and en excellent coffee. The service was friendly and helpful. We highly recommend this hotel for a short stay in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Elizabeth and Grace make your day!”
Reviews.Author: Johnny A
Reviews.Content: We spent Labor Day weekend at Seven Gables in Branson. Elizabeth at the front desk did everything to make our stay great, including getting us reduced show tickets and changing our room out to one that had better wifi. The room was large and clean and quiet. We were there during the remnants of Tropical Storm Isaac so the on again/off again wifi was probably due to the storm, but Elizabeth called them often trying to get us the service we needed. I never had the free breakfast, so no comment there. We'd stay again, as their attitude was very friendly and positive.

Reviews.Title: “Average room, average price!”
Reviews.Author: Mary P
Reviews.Content: Upon arriving the front lobby smelled and was dirty. However, our room was clean but dated, with a cracked sink and old furnishings. It was quiet with comfortable beds. For the price it was adequate. Did not eat breakfast there.

Reviews.Title: “Our "go-to" Branson hotel”
Reviews.Author: Pearlized80
Reviews.Content: I recommend this hotel to anyone needing a room in Branson. My husband and I have stayed here many times over the years. Several years ago the quality, cleanliness, etc had went downhill and we wouldn't go back. We then learned that the property had new managers and had really picked back up. About 4 years ago, we went back and haven't regretted it! We tell all our friends to use Seven Gables! Grace is the best hostess and makes you feel like you're the only guest she has. She has slowly, but surely, remodeled the property and made it a first rate hotel again. Every time we get ready to go to Branson, we'll glance through the hotel listings, but always end up agreeing to stay with Grace again. We can count on the folks at Seven Gables to give us the best deal for the money. The breakfast is wonderful. We've tried eating at breakfast buffets on the strip but both agree that we'd just rather eat Grace's breakfast. It's always fresh and has a wonderful selection and you can't beat the price! Grace - your hard work, pleasant attitude, and superior customer service is what keeps us coming back! We'll see you this weekend!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hospitality!!!”
Reviews.Author: Babymomma325
Reviews.Content: We just got done with a 2 night stay at Seven Gables and excellent service! Not a perfect room but the hospitality made up for it! My sons feet were a little dirty after running around barefoot last night and the shower could have been a little taller (since I am tall). Grace was fabulous! She definitely loves getting to know everyone who stays there and is so helpful with whatever you need! Breakfast was so good and hot as well! I thought it was very sweet when Grace prayed with a family this morning because there son was going to have surgery soon! So sweet! I would highly recommend this place and I would definitely come back myself!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: jeff w
Reviews.Content: The owners are fantastic.Grace and John take the time to personally know your family. The breakfast is home cooked and always fresh. The rooms have new mattresses and are clean.Our family has vacationed in Branson for over 25 years and this is by far the best VALUE of all. Jeff and Penny

Reviews.Title: “Great find exellent staff”
Reviews.Author: bgforsheezy
Reviews.Content: Grace was the nicest person ive ever met jacuzzi room was awsome not even dust in the room awsome thanks to everyone at seven gables for making my annivisary awsome I will be going back next year ive stayd at hilton condos that were not as nice as this thanks again

Reviews.Title: “Great find!”
Reviews.Author: MissouriTraveler71
Reviews.Content: We had decided to stay, last minute, at Branson on our way home from Alabama. We had called several of our regular Branson hotels/condos (we visit Branson several times yearly) to find that they had no vacancy. I found the Seven Gables Inn on Tripadvisor, and it got great ratings, so I called. They just happened to have two rooms available for the next evening (last ones), and we booked them. Upon arrival, the young lady at the front desk was extremely nice and accommodating. We swam in the pool, which was very clean. Rooms were spotless and smelled great. Although this is an older hotel, it has had many upgrades, such as new mattresses, flat screen tvs, great ac/heater units, and lovely country quilts. The breakfast the next morning was FANTASTIC! There were homemade sausage gravy and biscuits, oatmeal, a terrific egg/sausage/cheese breakfast casserole, as well as cereal and a waffle maker. The owners were friendly and took the time to interact with everyone. It was a great find, and we would definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place to Stay.”
Reviews.Author: dcrowe1956
Reviews.Content: We booked this motel not really knowing anything about it or it's owners. The room was very clean and comfortable, the beds were topped with pillow top mattresses. They were busy the whole week putting in new mattresses and updating rooms. We all slept wonderfully, the rooms were very well insulated so you didn't hear the people in the next room or outside. My son showered in the middle of the night several time to try to ease his pain and we never heard him. Fridge, microwave in great working order and air conditioner worked great keeping up with 108* weather. The breakfasts were great also, waffles, eggs, gravy, biscuits, dry cereals, oatmeal, donuts, coffee and juice. They served breakfast until 9:30 am and several times I witnessed some of the guest coming in around 9:15 and the owner was always on top of things and made sure everyone had as much food as they wanted sometimes even mixing up more waffle batter. Very nice family operated business and awesome Christians to top it off. The owner always had a song in her heart as she kept herself busy cleaning tables, visiting the guest and getting to know them in a more personal relationship. We didn't use the pool but it looked very well maintained. We will definitely stay here again. I give it a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: Stephanie C
Reviews.Content: My husband and I decided to take a short honeymoon at the last minute, and we decided to stay at Seven Gables after a few of our other choices around the lake were booked. We were glad we did! We've been to the Branson area MANY times (we go annually), but this was our first time staying in town, and if we ever do it again, we know we'll stay at Seven Gables. The rooms are VERY clean, the beds are comfortable, the air conditioning worked perfectly. We stayed in a King Jacuzzi room, and the Jacuzzi was wonderful...it worked perfectly and it, too, was very clean! The microwave and refrigerator were also in perfect working condition. We didn't go down for breakfast at all, so I can't really comment on that, but we were told exactly when and where it was held daily. We also kept the "Do Not Disturb" sign on the door, and that was respected by the cleaning staff (I read reviews from many other places in the area where this was not the case!).The woman who greeted us (the owner or manager, I presume) was very kind and was very willing to help in any way she could. Overall, for a short trip for a couple, this place is a great value!!

Reviews.Title: “seven gables inn great hospitality and rate”
Reviews.Author: kenneth c
Reviews.Content: this is one of the best hotels we have ever stayed in. it is very very clean the people running it were so nice and the rate was great.easy on budget.room smells soooo good and ac works great. had to keep turning it down cuz it was so cold. we even booked shows here and Grace(the manager) worked hard to get us the best seats possible. breakfast was amazing.staff goes out of their way to make u feel welcome. and it is located just off 76 close to everything without being directly on the main strip. i cannot say enough good things about this place. whenever i go to branson again this is were i will be staying. another good thing is it is not a resort. so they don't push a timeshare on you. there arent many hotels like this left. trust me on this stay here and you will see

Reviews.Title: “Great Motel to Stay At”
Reviews.Author: Gary H
Reviews.Content: This was one of the best places that I've stayed at in a long time. From the very beginning, at check-in, the feeling of being at home was ever-present. The friendliness and caring of management down to the workers was beyond belief. It was all to make my friend and I feel very confortable. The rooms were very clean, beds confortable, and the continental breakfast was fantastic. And the pool was so clean. It just so happened that my friend and I was in the right place at the right time. An opportunity came up that my friend and I became a part of: A sing-a-long with a piano playing guest, one of the owners, and my friend and I. It was wonderful. The owner, well, she has a wonderful voice. I must say this was a memorable experience.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, budget friendly, and AWESOME breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: bbop3
Reviews.Content: The warmth and hospitality at the Seven Gables Inn was a breath of fresh air! It is affordable, clean and centrally located to many activities. It is obvious that Mrs. Chen, the manager, and her family take great pride in their inn by making all guests feel welcome. Daniel, the son, acted happy to greet us upon arrival. (Remember to inquire about a "room & show tickets" package, too.) The room was comfortable and included a fridge and microwave. The pool, which was clean, was a pleasant treat in the summer heat and humidity! Breakfast at the Chen's inn was delicious, plentiful, and awesome! It is not just a "quick breakfast snack" to begin the day, but a wholesome and complete breakfast that includes homemade biscuits & gravy, Mr. Chen's 'famous' breakfast casserole, fresh batter for waffles, fresh fruit compote, a variety of dry cereal & milk, hot oatmeal, juice, coffee, and tea! Mrs. Chen welcomes breakfast guests with a cheerful greeting and is often heard humming beautiful songs as she works in the breakfast room. The highlight of the stay was an impromptu song fest one morning as another guest, Mrs. Chen, and I shared our love of music around her beautiful Yamaha piano! What a great experience! If one is looking for a "quiet get-a-way" or a family adventure, Seven Gables Inn will extend your budget, provide clean & comfortable lodging, and begin each day with a complete & delicious fresh breakfast!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay and very convenient”
Reviews.Author: ArlingtonMarkham
Reviews.Content: Grace and her staff do an outstanding job, and her husband cooks the best breakfast ever! She (Grace) and her daughter (Elizabeth) got us discounted tickets to 2 of the best shows ever (Presley's Country Jubilee and Legends In Concert). We highly recommend these shows. We also highly recommend the Seven Gables Inn. The rooms are large, clean, have pillow top mattresses (very comfortable), and flat screen T.V's. We will definitely stay there again. A 10 all the way! Gary and Marsha Markham Arlington, Texas

Reviews.Title: “grace was nice”
Reviews.Author: phg0978
Reviews.Content: We thought the manager was very nice. They had a very good breakfast lots of choices. We booked a hot tub room for our 30 th anniversary and that was a lot of fun. The only negative thing we could think of was the pool. There was no drinks allowed and no umbrellas to sit under. Overall it was a nice place close to the Titanic Museum which we loved.

Reviews.Title: “The best place where you can live in”
Reviews.Author: msfarhan
Reviews.Content: I was looking for hotel to live in Branson, MO to spend the vacation with my family. I found Seven Gables is the most convenient place. They have full hot breakfast and discounted tickets. The most important is that the manager of the hotel is very nice and very helpful. They look forward to help the people who live in the hotel. They have really excellent management. One of the really greatful thing is that I forgot my son’s computer mouse when I left the hotel. The next day the manager called me and asked me if I lost computer mouse and they offered to send it to me by mail for free. I really recommend anyone who wants to go to Branson, MO and save money with peacefull mind to stay at this fantastic hotel.

Reviews.Title: “5 Star Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Galen T
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have found our second home. In 2010 we found Seven Gables Hotel, Hotel; Excellent Rooms; Bright and cheery, A+ clean. Breakfast; Out of this world. Staff; Manager Grace Chun, husband John Chun and Group Sales Manager Elizabeth Chun are the greatest Hotel staff. They make you feel as if you were a Rock Star.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Manager”
Reviews.Author: salturky
Reviews.Content: The Manager is very very nice. She helped us a lot on many shows booking and discounts. She always makes sure that each resident has been satisfied with the services and having fun during his/her/their stay. I realy recommend this Hotel to everyone going to Branson,MI.

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: Chad J
Reviews.Content: Once again another GREAT STAY at Seven Gables....So glad the tornado didnt do any major damage to this FINE INN! THANKS GRACE and everyone else at Seven Gables! See ya in another 4 or 5 weeks!

Reviews.Title: “worth more than the price”
Reviews.Author: ray c
Reviews.Content: we had a very nice 3-night stay in this reasonably-priced inn. the room was spacious, it had a frig and microwave; it was practically walking distance from the main drag; the free breakfast was excellent with the owners making the waffles themselves. most of all, Grace the manager was very helpful, courteous, and very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “"Little" things made my stay in Branson all the better”
Reviews.Author: Koob
Reviews.Content: Have stayed in this motel 11 times over the years. Always has been a good deal for me. Nice, clean place, good breakfast room. Owners stay on top of things. If anything goes wrong, they're on it right away. I love the location: near the strip, but not on it, right next to one of my favorite restaurants, Jackie B. Goode's Uptown Cafe. John and Grace are the owners. John stays mostly in the background, while Grace has a lot of contact with the customers. I drive 560 miles to get to Branson, and when I first saw Grace in the breakfast room this time, she told me that she had prayed for my safety on the trip. That meant a lot to me. On my last day in the breadfast room, I overheard Grace praying with an older woman who wasn't feeling well. Where else would I find a hostess like that?

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: Jean L
Reviews.Content: I normally don't write reviews but I had to write a review about this place. It was my first visit to Branson, MO and my co worker had recommended this place and let me just say... It was a GREAT recommendation. When I first walked in, I was greeted by the owner Grace and her daughter Liz.. They were absolutely wonderful! I felt very welcomed and there was no awkwardness of not knowing what to do. Check in only took about 10 minutes. This was my first time in Branson, so i had no idea what to do, so when I asked them, Liz told me about all the shows, where to eat, where to go, and etc. She then offered me the 2 show 1 night deal which made my trip a lot cheaper. They even had this amazing breakfast. I wasn't going to go but Grace was so nice I had to stop by and I'm so glad I did. They had breakfast casserole, biscuits with gravy, toast, and etc. I went almost EVERY morning. It was delicious. If you go, please try the breakfast casserole. The rooms were very clean. They also mentioned they had received new mattresses the week before and boy was I pleased. Normally when you go hotels, inns, or motels the beds are kind of squeaky but the bed I stayed on was perfectly soft but yet hard. The location was great too. We always walked over to Walgreens which was across the street and we even walked over to the Winery. All in all, I would recommend this place. =)

Reviews.Title: “Ok for what you pay...”
Reviews.Author: Mommyof2gurlz
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 2 nights, so the price was right. Rooms were clean, not the wow factor-but for the price-not too bad. Walls are thin, you can hear your neighbors and their "extra curricular activities"...breakfast was ok-but not the best I've had at a hotel. Like I said, for the price, not too bad.

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Chad J
Reviews.Content: I stay here when my friends are not in town..Stayed here again a few weeks ago..Same great service at the same great price. AWESOME breakfast as usual!

Reviews.Title: “Simple and clean for the right price.”
Reviews.Author: bwsmoney
Reviews.Content: No frills here, but that's okay. We got a clean, comfy room for a great price. The lady who runs the place is awesome. The only problem I had is that we could hear our neighbors very clearly through the walls. The breakfast was good, not great.

Reviews.Title: “The ONLY PLACE!”
Reviews.Author: Chad J
Reviews.Content: This is the ONLY PLACE I stay in Branson. Reasonable price..Good Rooms and they have a GREAT BREAKFAST! Ya have to try the egg stuff the owner makes. Its AWESOME! I come to Branson 3 times a year and this is the ONLY PLACE I stay at.

Reviews.Title: “Older Property but well maintained and freindly staff.”
Reviews.Author: Lasagnejoe
Reviews.Content: Good value for the money. Staff helpful and good breakfast selection (more on the order of a b&b). Probably the best value for the money in town.

Reviews.Title: “Greatest Value in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Kayece
Reviews.Content: The motel has the most wonderful pillow top mattresses and even the pillows were fantastic! Best night's sleep we've had in a motel! The food was super delicious and the hospitality of the hosts was above rapport! This place is far above any of the $100 rooms in Branson, but the best part is their service to the guests! We will definitely stay again! Great place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Diane S
Reviews.Content: We felt so welcomed here, Grace and Elizabeth are amazing, so welcoming, making you feel like family. So concerned it is a great experience, we will definetely stay there again when we go to Branson. I will never forget our first experience at Seven Gables, and the compassion we were shown. Great breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Love this motel!”
Reviews.Author: S H
Reviews.Content: We come to Branson often because of the distance from our home. We discovered this motel a few years ago-we love it! All our rooms have been nice, and we have enjoyed their breakfast. The owners are super nice and want you happy with your stay! Last year I had to leave early due to an illness, and Grace was so scared it was because we were unhappy with our room. As an added plus, their wifi has always worked perfect for us. They are right off the main strip yet noise hasn't been a problem!

Reviews.Title: “Loved the hosts”
Reviews.Author: David R
Reviews.Content: Our 54th anniversary trip. We had lived in Seoul 3 years in the late 80s and love the Korean people so were elated to find the same hospitilaty that we had enjoyed in the native country of our hosts here. They are so friendly and helpful, we will definately return. The breakfast was great even without kimchi.

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Inn”
Reviews.Author: RangerTom
Reviews.Content: The inn was quiet, not crowded, and just 2 blocks off of the "Strip." The staff was friendly and very helpful. Our rooms were ready upon arrival and professionally serviced each day. The hot breakfast was very good, including a wonderful breakfast casserole and waffles. The beds were comfortable. Pool is small but not usually crowded. Pretty basic accommodations but that was what we were looking for. This is our 6th year to stay at the Seven Gables Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: amyd78
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed 2 nights at the Seven Gables Inn. While some minor things could use some updating and repair, the room was very clean and the staff was very friendly. The TV was older and had poor sound quality and the sink and tub were cracked/stained and needed to be replaced. Breakfast was good, and the beds were very comfortable. We wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Sufficient”
Reviews.Author: HowlforVacation
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a couple of nights during November 2010. Overall I was pleased. Price was reasonable. The free breakfast was good:biscuit & gravy, eggs, donuts, cereal, juice. Staff was very friendly and accomodating. Location was convenient. Fridge and Microwave in room. Room was a little out dated and could stand to be rennovated. We had a room on the back side of the hotel and it overlooked a trailer park and storage units, so the view left something to be desired. But overall the stay was good and I would return again. I recommend suggesting a room in the front of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “great”
Reviews.Author: goatman4u
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were on our Honeymoon. Well I guess you could say that. We have been married 53 years and this is the first without children. After raiseing 9 children we finally got to take a trip. Our room at the motel was very nice. The continental breakfast was fabulous. Our hostest was very gracious and she made our stay very restful and enjoyable. The holel was located at a place where we could get around to the shows that we wanted to go.Thanks so much for makeing our visit a great one.

Reviews.Title: “A very nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: moondog5370
Reviews.Content: We stayed four nights at this hotel and I have nothing but good things to say about it. The owners are very friendly. The breakfast is very good. The kids loved the biscuits and gravy. The room was very clean. Very comfortable and soft beds. We will definately be coming back next year for our vacation in branson.

Reviews.Title: “A great little Branson Getaway”
Reviews.Author: MrChristian
Reviews.Content: I took my wife for a pre-valentines weekend getaway because of our work schedules. I hit the web and found BransonTrips.com they were great. They took care of everything, got us a great room a Seven Gables Inn, took care of show tickets for us, and took care of dinner too. The Hotel was the best, just off of the strip and such nice people. Will deffintely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Check out the greatest hotel in Branson!!”
Reviews.Author: tedde2cute
Reviews.Content: Our 2 night stay at the Seven Gables Inn was a wonderful experience! The rooms were very clean & comfortable...Gracie and the entire staff gave us the red carpet treatment the entire visit and are very real, down to earth, spiritial and compassionate people! ~May God Bless each of you~ If you are seeking a nice place please consider this one, (it rates A1 in my book)...You will be glad you did...:P

Reviews.Title: “Pleased”
Reviews.Author: CTZS
Reviews.Content: We stayed here July 22-26 2009 we have NO complaints. Our room was very CLEAN and the staff was very NICE and very HELPFUL. The beds were very comfortable. We searched many places to stay online and for what we wanted Double Queen with Frig and Microwave...and not over priced was hard to find; most of them did not even offer the extras in the rooms...one place you rented a blow dryer. Here we got all that and breakfast in the mornings. We were very pleased as we got what we wanted...just wish we could have spent more time in the pool but was on the go most the time. We will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: golfstar30
Reviews.Content: I would like to thank Grace and her husband ( owners ) for their very personable service. They were very friendly and great conversationalist. They also seem like very caring people. My wife and I rented the Jacuzzi room for 4 days..( June 8 to 12) The room was very clean and had enough room for all my wife's luggage and the things she bought while in Branson. The hotel is located just outside the main strip..so you won't hear all the traffic, and most things are walking distance from the hotel. If you don't want to break the bank for a room in Branson and want a comfortable and clean room..you must check out Seven Gables INN. Regards, Jacob

Reviews.Title: “3 Nites at this hotel motel”
Reviews.Author: CindyNan
Reviews.Content: I have to say it was clean, I also found that having nice quilts on the bed was a nice surprise. I have to say though that I was disappointed when I walked in to see one bed with a high mattress and the other lower so in other words one queen bed was about 10 inches lower than the other, which mad it hard to get in and out of being a senior. There were no other accomendations in Brabson that weekend. Our room was clean as stated and no smells soft sheets, towels etc. The maid kept the room up and done. I was a bit concerned that the rooms had regular keys, that didnt make me feel as safe as most key card rooms. It is nicely located off the strip which is always bumper to bumper traffic. We did have a small fridge and microwave in the room which was convenient. We did not eat at the continental breakfast that was available. If you want clean and a room in the $60 range then this is recommended the office personnel are very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Not Disappointed At All”
Reviews.Author: OklahomaGma
Reviews.Content: Last week we were were needing a few days to get away from work and stress. Seven Gables came with the trip package we bought for Branson, I was a little apprehensive about this being such an old hotel, but was far from being disappointed. The rooms were very clean, the bed was one of the most comfortable beds I have slept in at any hotel (normally we stay in more expensive hotels), the breakfast and over all service was great. Would I recommend it? YES, in fact I already have to my parents and friends from work, especially those who are looking for a low priced but nice/clean hotel for a few days.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay at 7 Gables Inn”
Reviews.Author: laracegirl
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 7/2 - 7/6. This is an older hotel but is very clean. The people working here are very nice and helpful. The breakfast was good which was biscuits & gravy, fruit, oatmeal, donuts, coffee & juice. The pool was clean and well kept. It is walking distance to the strip and is in a quiet area. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Love it”
Reviews.Author: Lancers6
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at 7 Gables Inn. for years. We have family in Oklahoma, Kansas, AR. and Mo. We all stay here. We like the rooms they are clean and nice sized. They are very friendly. The last 2 weekends they have been booked so we had to find other places to stay. I have not been pleased with the other places. They also have a great breakfast for your family, and the friendly man who takes care of the breakfast is very helpful and funny, We are also thankful for the special discounts we get from the radio station. Thanks so much. The Lance Family from Siloam springs AR.

Reviews.Title: “okay”
Reviews.Author: rlynch0004
Reviews.Content: Me and my now Husband went to Branson and stayed at seven gables for our honeymoon. The owners were very nice and the breakfast was great. They really serve hot breakfast. The only problem was the shower. I have really long hair and there wasnt enough water to get my hair wet i had to use a cup everytime sucked! So if your a guy with short hair like really short or a woman then its a good deal. Not really for younger type people about 90 % of the people were over 70

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Motel”
Reviews.Author: Angelsmightlaugh
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this motel for 6 days while vacationing in Branson with our 4 children. I am very pleased with this motel because the rooms were VERY clean. They are in the process of being updated and the owner has done a wonderful job so far. New carpet, paint, mattresses, lighting, etc. They aren't quite done yet, but will be great when they are. The owner is extremely friendly, helpful and very conscious of her motel. Breakfast was donuts, cereal, fresh fruit, waffles and biscuits & gravy (yummy!). It is a block from the 76 strip so that was a bonus. It was a great motel and we will definately stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Memorial Day Value!”
Reviews.Author: Aortus
Reviews.Content: My husband, Aortus, booked this room for my sister and me at the last minute and got a very good price. There was a little confusion at check-in with our Expedia reservation, but it was quickly resolved. Our room was as advertised: not luxurious, but a clean, quiet, and comfy place to spend the night. The beds were excellent, the hotel was very quiet - my sister and I both slept like logs. Great location, too: close to the Titanic (yay!) and Legends. All in all, the Seven Gables provides a great value for the money. I would definitely consider staying there again. - Mrs. Aortus

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: MikeSTL
Reviews.Content: We were somewhat skeptical based on some of the earlier reviews but the reservation was made through a third party so we hoped for the best. What a pleasant surprise! The new owners are doing a wonderful job. The room was clean. Everything worked. The location is great. The owner was there every morning serving the continental breakfast. The present ownership has been in place for about eight months. Check the dates on the reviews here and make your own decision, but I wouldn't hesitate to refer my friends and family to the Seven Gables. The April snow was a bit of a disappointment, but you can't really blame that on the motel. Another thing to keep in mind, someone earlier complained about the stairs. The motel, like everything else in Branson, is built on a hill. We were on the third floor but only had to climb one flight of stairs if we came in from the back side of the building. Be sure to ask about that when you make your reservation. Mike and Jan Buckley

Reviews.Title: “New Ownerswhip Hugh Improvement”
Reviews.Author: SnowkingMN
Reviews.Content: I was concerned when I read the reviews on 7 Gables. We came to Branson on a condo sales deal and the hotel was included. Our experience was great. The room was totally redone includeing new tub and shower, new beads and beading, new carpet. Totally clean. We were unable to find our condo sales rep and phoned 7 Gables without our voucher. Grace, the owner, said to come on down and we could take care of the paperwork the next day. She came out to the car when we drove up and opened the car door. She served the breakfast early on the day we left so we could get an early start, Excellient hospitality. No hesitation to recommend. Low price great service in a great location.

Reviews.Title: “Bransons ,Seven Gables Inn , Great Place to stay !!”
Reviews.Author: sroofer1
Reviews.Content: After staying at higher rated motels in the past visits to branson,I was skeptic because of the reviews, we read on online,but how ever ' to our suprize we could not of been more pleased . staff and workers where very polite' room was spotless . real injoyable stay! Seth & Kathy Oliver Desoto,Mo

Reviews.Title: “Friendly & helpful”
Reviews.Author: Nanny17
Reviews.Content: Our church group traveled to Branson by motor coach & stayed at the Seven Gables Inn where we were met by a very friendly staff. 'The outside looks very nice but the inside is somewhat dated. Our rooms were clean & when we asked for extra pillows, they were brought promptly. There are no amenities in the room such as shampoo, coffee pot, etc. You have to request them. They were delivering new bedspreads to all the rooms the day we left. This motel is under new management & they seem to be trying to make your stay as pleasant & comfortable as possible. The breakfast room is small but they told us they were making plans to expand it which will be nice. There was plenty of the standard continental breakfast fare..Granted, it's not the Hilton & it needs some refurbishing, but it was clean & the staff was very friendly and helpful. Not sure what the charge was since the trip was a package deal.

HotelInfo.Name: Seven Gables Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 305 State Hwy 165, Branson, MO 65616
